'''1.7.10 Build 6''' is the sixth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on September 19, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Updated Tutorial World
* Debug mode is always enabled.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Signs losing text if "<code>=</code>" character was written in them.
* Popup that appears sometimes if you run a world made with 1.6.4 in 1.7.10 having too much stuff in it.
